channel.title: Why Can I Code Properly?
channel.description:
[b]Coding[/b] [i]Please Explain In Detail and As Simple As You Possibly Can.[/i]
[b]Train[/b] I know I have to use autospawn.java or .w/e to make an npc autospawn... but i need someone to explain,(In detail) how exactly i do it.
[b]Teleports[/b] How do I make a teleport command? I need to know badly.
[b]Teleports on Emote Tabs[/b] How do I make a teleport command on the emote tabs? [i]I already have the words on the tabs.[/i] one of the tabs say "Fally", but i don't know how to get the teleport command.
[b]Please Help[/b] [i]I need this to be Explained in the most basic terms you can think of.[/i]
Thank You ::kidd619::

item.title: Why Can I Code Properly?
item.dc:creator: @lemons_burn lemons burn
item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

To make your own shop

  1. find a blank npc that has the trade button auto spawn in the auto spawn foler ^^^aboce comment
    2)go in to client.java ctrl f shop = 43 copy and paste that whole code of the wanna shop ex wat to copy
    }
    if(NPCID == 2538){
    if(q11 != 15){
    PutNPCCoords = true;
    WanneShop = 4;
    PAST UNDER IT
    then go to shop handler and put the info of the shop ect type hit tab 3 times and put 0 TAB 0 THEN it will be item id and then the number.

Read full topic

item.title: Why Can I Code Properly?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  1. Autospawn configuration file - The first three numbers indicate NPCID, X Coordinate, and Y Coordinate, respectively.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("place")) { teleportToX = XXXX; // X Coordinate. teleportToY = YYYY; // Y Coordinate. }

  1. I’m not sure what the packet for interface clicking is.

Read full topic

Coding
Please Explain In Detail and As Simple As You Possibly Can.

Train
I know I have to use autospawn.java or .w/e to make an npc autospawn… but i need someone to explain,(In detail) how exactly i do it.

Teleports

one of the tabs say “Fally”, but i don’t know how to get the teleport command.
